Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show two students communicating using a string telephone.
The student can illustrate how the device uses sound to send messages between the students.
The student can demonstrate that the device allows communication over a distance.
The student can indicate that the device is made using the materials provided (e.g., cups and string).
The student can represent how sound travels along the string to enable communication.
The student can include a simple explanation of how the string telephone helps people communicate over distances.
